reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled on business
reviews.text: Not luxury but good value with attentive staff. It has nice location and fairly central - in the midway between the main railway station of Szczecin and city centre shopping. The room was standard, but clean, comfortable and had everything I needed for short term stay (maybe except the hairdryer). Linens provided and towels are changed daily. Free mineral water in the room. Wi-Fi is free and work fast. Most everything at breakfast was quite good, including the service as well as the food, however, it's a little overpriced. There is a possibility to use garage parking space for extra fee (25 zl per day). All in all a good standard in this category.
reviews.title: Good standard, central location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled solo
reviews.text: Great place for the price. Very professionally run with modern and very clean rooms & facilities.
reviews.title: Modern, clean and great value for city centre.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled on business
reviews.text: Location is also very close to the main train station and opposite the main cathedral in the city who's steeple is always visible on the city skyline so easy to find your way back when walking or driving.
reviews.title: Basic and cheap, not of the best quality..

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Restaurant and bar is nothing to write home about and breakfast is a little expensive so eat elsewhere.
reviews.title: Cheap as chips but very basic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled on business
reviews.text: Parking available under the hotel but I was lucky to just park on the pavement outside the hotel where taxis usually stand. This was allowed so I saved a bit on parking charges.
reviews.title: Perfectly Adequate

likes.liked: — Hotel was very comfortable, well run, and affordable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled on business
reviews.text: Stayed at the Campanile Szczecin Hotel for one night while heading south in Europe.
reviews.title: Good standard hotel centrally located in Szczecin

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is located quite centrally in Szczecin. Easy to park the car right outside the hotel, free of charge. The neighbourhood is a bit noisy (traffic) but I was in no way disturbed and slept comfortably during the night.
reviews.title: Excellent value for money, clean and big enough room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room is standard and what you would expect from a two star hotel. Still clean and in good shape.
reviews.title: "Good value for money"

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled solo
reviews.text: When arriving I was handed two coupons that said “A glass to welcome you, Free at our bar”. Very nice I thought and went to the bar.
reviews.title: A good option.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The bartender replied: No no, no free drinks in the bar. Go to the restaurant, buy some food and you’ll get your free drink.
reviews.title: Great value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: My wife & I stayed here for two nights in April, this being our third stay at this hotel. The price, quality etc is all good, however it lost marks for me on this occasion because we had a cold night! They have put summer duvets on (understandable for April), however it was unseasonably cold outside, so we asked reception if we could have extra bed covers. We were told they didn't have any and so had quite a chilly night as the room heating isn't great. Also there was an annoying noise from the fan/air duct in the bathroom which we couldn't switich off which reception said would go off itself during the night. The next day we were given an additional duvet which sorted the problem, but this should really have been available the first night.
reviews.title: Good hotel, but slight drop in standards!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall a very good budget hotel in a good location which comfortable and does the job. Slightly let down on this occasion, but it wouldn't put me off staying here again!
reviews.title: Pleasantly average

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: This hotel made for a cheap break as in total I paid £116 for a double room for 5 nights. However, considering how incredibly cheap food and drink is in the city, I would not for a second recommend ordering from the bar or getting breakfast. For 39PLN (or 7 ish quid) the breakfast buffet was small and simple and not at all enticing. We were also charged 59PLn for a vodka red bull and jack daniels and coke when in bars across the city it would cost no more than 30PLN at the most expensive.
reviews.title: Clean, tidy, comfortable budget hotel that puts other to shame

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel room was average, but lacked a safety deposit box. Free wifi is included but for two days we struggled with connection (not so good for picking up business emails etc). The staff were very helpful and wouldnt hesitate to arrange any of our cabs.
reviews.title: Excellent value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled on business
reviews.text: All in all, for what it was- a cheap break- I cannot complain.
reviews.title: Standard hotel from Campanile chain

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a great hotel for a city break in Szczecin! The rooms are large, spotlessly clean and comfortable and had everything we needed for a short stay. The location is second to none being just a short walk to the train station and to all local restaurants, cafes, bars and shopping centres. The bed was comfortable, the shower was powerful and it was an added bonus to have tea and coffee making facilities. Reception staff speak very good English and were very helpful with arranging our transport back to the airport.The only downsides to the hotel was the lack of plug sockets in the room-only one in the bedroom and the cost of drinks in the hotel bar which were the highest we paid anywhere in Szczecin! That said there is no shortage of bars nearby so this should not put you off! When we return to Szczecin we will certainly stay here again!
reviews.title: Perfect base to explore Szczecin!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nothing very outstanding, as long as comfort and amenities were concerned, but the location just across the cathedral and 15 minutes away from the train station make it a sensible choice if you're on a budget. Free internet, but breakfast was too expensive, I passed. Recommended place for a short stay
reviews.title: Great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: excellent staff , great value for money , clean and perfectly situated
reviews.title: euro 2012 base

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great location for the hotel, within easy walking distance of everywhere and only about 10 mins from the station. All we wanted was a cheap break, we got a cheap clean room that were a decent size with a large bed and good shower - nothing much else to say, if you just want a few nights away from everything without paying the earth, you could a lot worse than booking this hotel. Friendly helpful staff as well!
reviews.title: Clean, Simple & Good Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for 3 nights and I found the hotel to be clean and tidy. Our double room had ample space for a few nights stay but there was lots of hangers and space if you were staying longer. 10 mins walk from the station and lots of shops and nightlife within a short walk. I borrowed a hairdryer from Reception and they have a locked room for leaving your luggage - anything we asked the staff they were more than helpful. I would definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Great stay
